title: How to Pass Numerical Reasoning Tests, 2E [Epub & Mobi] [Sto
description:
How to Pass Numerical Reasoning Tests: A Step-by-Step Guide to Learning Key Numeracy Skills (Testing Series) 
Author: Heidi Smith
Published: 2013
Publisher: Kogan Page
ISBN: 9780749467983
Format: Retail Epub and Mobi
Reader Required:
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle app, Calibre, MoonReader for Android

Designed to help anyone lacking in practice, How to Pass Numerical Reasoning Tests is an invaluable resource for brushing up on your maths skills. An overview of the basics is followed by a step-by-step guide to numerical tests including fractions and decimals, rates, percentages, data interpretation and ratios and proportions.

Written in an approachable way and using an easy to follow format, it will help boost your understanding and develop your analytical skills. Focusing on the core areas of numeracy, it will help you learn to answer questions without using of a calculator and dramatically increase your numerical confidence.
